channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Specialists in relocating Americans to Europe and Canada are seeing the phone ringing off the hook since the Trump vs Biden debate
item.description: "If you're no longer working and you could choose to live anywhere in the world, why would you choose to live in the U.S. now?"

item.title: Bill Ackman's IPO of Pershing Square closed-end fund is postponed, NYSE says
item.description: Bill Ackman is postponing the highly scrutinized listing of Pershing Square's U.S. closed-end fund, according to a notice on the NYSE's website.

item.title: Ackman’s Pershing Square USA says IPO is still happening, despite delay notice
New Yorkers immediately protest new AI-based weapons detectors on subways
item.description: “It’s not going to work," said Dre Thomas, 25, shaking his head at the device.

item.title: What Kamala Harris' latest financial disclosure reveals about her investment portfolio
item.description: Financial experts sum up Vice President Kamala Harris' latest financial disclosure of her personal assets in one word: Boring. But that's not a bad thing.

item.title: Why Zelle scams worry lawmakers so much — and how they could hurt you
General Motors, Honda, and Hyundai are accused of inappropriately selling customer data
item.description: Verisk used the data to prepare reports on driving-behavior history and sold them to insurance companies, two senators alleged.

item.title: Apple, Microsoft among 'Magnificent Seven' stocks set to report next week. Here's what that means
item.description: Wall Street could be in for a volatile bout of trading next week if this one was anything to go by.

item.title: Some of 2024’s most popular trades coming undone after hitting ‘stupid’ levels
Mass exodus in Mexico after cartel violence intensifies
item.description: Two of Mexico’s most powerful cartels from the northern states of Sinaloa and Jalisco have been battling for control of smuggling routes.

item.title: Dexcom shares plunge more than 40% for worst day on record
item.description: Dexcom, which had its stock market debut in 2005, had its worst day ever after lowering its full-year guidance.

item.title: Dow scores 4th straight weekly gain as U.S. stocks rally Friday after pullback
A 59-year-old widow has been forced to use a breathing tube and skyrocketing demand for wood pellets in the EU might be to blame
item.description: Wood pellet production is feeding demand for renewable energy in the EU, but it's taking a toll on Americans' health.

item.title: Nvidia could be on the verge of a massive technical sell-off, chart analyst warns
item.description: Nvidia has struggled in July and could have further downside, according to Raymond James.

item.title: Olympians’ families turn to GoFundMe in race to see loved ones compete in Paris
